dare-you-to-death.title: Dare You to Death
dare-you-to-death.summary: After a mysterious death at a party, two adversarial officers team up to uncover the truth, revealing deeper conspiracies.

the-heart-killers.title: The Heart Killers
the-heart-killers.summary: Inspired by 'The Taming of the Shrew', this series follows a mission to woo a notorious assassin, leading to unexpected romantic entanglements.

ploy's-yearbook.title: Ploy's Yearbook
ploy's-yearbook.summary: A nostalgic journey through high school memories, focusing on friendships, love, and personal growth.

hidden-agenda.title: Hidden Agenda
hidden-agenda.summary: Zo seeks help from Joke, his classmate's ex-boyfriend, to win her heart, leading to unexpected twists in their relationship.

home-school.title: Home School
home-school.summary: A suspenseful drama set in a mysterious boarding school where students uncover hidden truths.
cast: Joong Archen Aydin as Young Master Amin

our-skyy-2.title: Our Skyy 2
our-skyy-2.summary: An anthology series revisiting beloved couples from previous Thai BL dramas, exploring their continued stories.

mafia-the-series:-guns-and-freaks.title: Mafia The Series: Guns and Freaks
mafia-the-series:-guns-and-freaks.summary: A thrilling tale of mafia conflicts, focusing on the lives of gang members and their intertwined relationships.

star-and-sky:-star-in-my-mind.title: Star & Sky: Star in My Mind
star-and-sky:-star-in-my-mind.summary: Daonuea confesses his feelings to Khabkluen before moving abroad. Years later, they reunite at university, leading to a rekindling of past emotions.

the-warp-effect.title: The Warp Effect
the-warp-effect.summary: A teenager experiences a time-traveling mishap that leads him to navigate complex relationships and self-discovery.

2moons2.title: 2Moons2
2moons2.summary: A continuation of the original '2Moons' series, focusing on the romantic relationships of university students. Joong portrays Ming, a charismatic and confident student who develops a romantic relationship with Kit.
